description: Try our easy to follow Lime Spiked Pancakes With Blueberries And Pecans recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Blueberry,Soy free,Vegetarian,Quick & easy breakfast,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Lime Spiked Pancakes With Blueberries And Pecans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 30g slightly salted butter, melted and cooled

recipeInstructions.text: Place the flour, baking powder and brown sugar in a large mixing bowl. Make a well in the centre and pour in the eggs, butter and milk. Start whisking, drawing in the dry ingredients slowly as you go. Whisk until you have a smooth batter, then stir in the lime zest. Or, you can whizz all the ingredients in a food processor and then stir in the lime zest.
Heat a griddle or large heavy based frying pan. Add a small portion of butter and as soon as it has melted, place a tablespoon of batter into the pan.
Repeat with the remaining batter. Serve the pancakes in a pile with a scattering of blueberries, pecans, a drizzle of maple syrup and a topping of butter.
